casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Temon Tavoi MCNEIL 420P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 28, 2018 Sean Paul Vitrano, Attorney at Law, Wake Forest, for McNeil, Temon Tavoi. John H. Schaeffer, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of November 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of November 2018."
